Potion, rare
Flying balm is a greasy salve that, when smeared onto your shoulders, causes you to sprout wings that give you a flying speed of 30 feet. The wings can be feathered or batlike at your option. The wings are too small to be the real source of flight, which is instead similar to a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]{fly} spell. This flying ability lasts 1 hour. Clothing and armor don’t interfere with the wings as they’re magical.
